boat.construction_details: Clinker ply hull with Utile backbone and fit out. Spruce spars.
boat.full_description:
This little dinghy was built for rowing and gently pottering about under sail on the River Yealm.

The positions of the thwarts have been changed on this boat from the original design (with the approval of the designer), so that she balances properly for rowing with just one person on board.

The rig is a balanced lug sail.

She won the Watercraft award for the most professional-looking home-built boat at the Beale Park Boat Show 2018.
boat.name: Marsaili
boat.short_description: Marsaili is a "Guillemot" class dinghy designed by Iain Oughtred and built by her first owner David Bewick.
